titleStmt.title: Robin Hood and the butcher To the tune of, Robin Hood and the begger.
titleStmt.author: Robins, Thomas, fl. 1672-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Grove on Snow Hill,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Come all you brave gallants [and] listen a while,".
Identified on UMI microfilm as STC 20592.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
